sentence: Since the 2020 election, former President Donald Trump has been eager to oust Georgia Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger for blocking efforts to overturn the 2020 election in the state.
author: Adam Brewster, Aaron Navarro
title: Georgia primary pits Pence-endorsed Brian Kemp against Trump-backed David Perdue

sentence: On Monday, Pence made his most emphatic break yet with the ex-president when he headlined a rally for Trump foe Brian Kemp on the eve of the Georgia governor's landslide victory over a Trump-backed primary challenger.
author: Agence France-Presse
title: The comeback kid: ex-VP Pence steps out of Trump's shadow
